casebody.data:
ALEXANDER STEVENS’ Ex’r. vs. GREEN HILL CEMETERY COMPANY. Bayard, for plaintiff. Rogers, for defendant.

Order for bill of particular?.

Indeb. assumpsit—narr. Plea, issue.

Mr. Bayard, at the first term after issue joined, moved for a bill of particulars of the plaintiff’s demand: which the court ordered; and that proceedings be stayed until it is furnished.
